column1: Yuxia Subdistrict (Chinese: 玉霞街道; pinyin: Yùxiá Jiēdào) is a subdistrict of Dingcheng District in Changde Prefecture-level City
column3: China. Dividing a portion of the former Wuling Town (Chinese: 武陵镇)
column4: the subdistrict was formed in 2013. It has an area of 4.69 km2 (1.81 sq mi) with a population of 76
